author: quinlan
msg: since this is serving as our current "Who we are" page, split out the PMC

author: akarasulu
msg: moving all protocol handler objects to new protocol package

author: felicity
msg: bug 3749: MIME parts can have no actual body (following the RFC).  previously the parser would ignore that part, but not all mails are RFC compliant...  so now we fake an empty body if the body doesn't actually exist, and add a node in the tree for that part.

author: felicity
msg: bug 3748: when subparsing a message/* type, if the part was empty, Message-new() would wait for STDIN input.  now only do a subparse if the part actually has decoded data in it.

author: crossley
msg: Use minimal systemIdentifier to implement the workaround for Issue FOR-255:
catalog entity-resolver fails and gets skinconf DTD from website
